panels.content:
```

   Private IP        : $instance
   Kernel Version    : $kernel_version
   Kubelet Version   : $kubelet_version
   Operating System  : $os_image
   Container Runtime : $container_runtime_version

```
panels.title: Node Information

targets.expr: scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="Ready", status="true"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="Ready", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="Ready", status="false"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="MemoryPressure", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="MemoryPressure", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="MemoryPressure", status="true"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="DiskPressure", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="DiskPressure", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="DiskPressure", status="true"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="OutOfDisk", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="OutOfDisk", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="OutOfDisk", status="true"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="PIDPressure", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="PIDPressure", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="PIDPressure", status="true"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="KernelDeadlock", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="KernelDeadlock", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="KernelDeadlock", status="true"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="NetworkUnavailable", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="NetworkUnavailable", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="NetworkUnavailable", status="true"} * 3)

scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="FrequentUnregisterNetDevice", status="false"} * 1) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="FrequentUnregisterNetDevice", status="unknown"} * 2) + scalar(kube_node_status_condition{job="$kube_job", service="$kube_service", node="$node", condition="FrequentUnregisterNetDevice", status="true"} * 3)

(1 - (min(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$node_job", service="$node_service", instance=~"^$instance:[0-9]{1,5}", device=~"^/dev/.*"}) by (device) / min(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$node_job", service="$node_service", instance=~"^$instance:[0-9]{1,5}", device=~"^/dev/.*"}) by (device))) * 100

(sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{job="$container_job", service="$container_service", node="$node", container_name!=""}) by (namespace) / scalar(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="$node_job", service="$node_service", instance=~"^$instance:[0-9]{1,5}"})) * 100

(sum(container_memory_usage_bytes{job="$container_job", service="$container_service", node="$node", container_name!=""}) by (pod_name) / scalar(node_memory_MemTotal_bytes{job="$node_job", service="$node_service", instance=~"^$instance:[0-9]{1,5}"})) * 100

(1 - (min(node_filesystem_avail_bytes{job="$node_job", service="$node_service", instance=~"^$instance:[0-9]{1,5}", device=~"^/dev/.*"}) by (device) / min(node_filesystem_size_bytes{job="$node_job", service="$node_service", instance=~"^$instance:[0-9]{1,5}", device=~"^/dev/.*"}) by (device))) * 100
